mapper.select: /* PostMapper, selectAllPosts */ SELECT POST_ID , NICKNAME , TITLE , CONTENT , CREATED_AT FROM POSTS ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC

/* PostMapper, searchedPosts */ SELECT P.POST_ID , P.NICKNAME , P.TITLE , P.CREATED_AT FROM POSTS AS P WHERE 1=1
AND LOWER(P.TITLE) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%'

/* PostMapper, selectPost */ SELECT P.POST_ID , P.NICKNAME AS POST_NICKNAME , P.TITLE AS POST_TITLE , P.CONTENT AS POST_CONTENT , P.CREATED_AT AS POST_CREATED_AT , A.ANSWER_ID , A.NICKNAME AS ANSWER_NICKNAME , A.CONTENT AS ANSWER_CONTENT , A.CREATED_AT AS ANSWER_CREATED_AT FROM POSTS AS P LEFT JOIN ANSWERS AS A ON P.POST_ID = A.POST_ID WHERE 1=1
AND P.POST_ID = #{postId}

/* PostMapper, findById */ SELECT POST_ID , NICKNAME , PASSWORD , TITLE , CONTENT , CREATED_AT FROM POSTS WHERE 1=1
AND POST_ID = #{postId}
